myTunes

myTunes.

Your music, movies, and TV show take center stage.

The latest entertainment apps now come installed with macOS Catalina. Upgrade today to get your favourite music, movies, TV shows and podcasts. You can join Apple Music and stream — or download and play offline — over 60 million songs, ad‑free.

Music

45 million songs. Zero ads.

Discover all the ways you can showcase content on Apple Music. Access MusicKit, RSS feeds, widgets, brand guidelines, badge art, and more.

Start Your Trial Now

Orange Music is availabe in myTunes, and for iOS and Android devices.

The movie and TV collection you always wished for. Granted.

With over 100,000 movies and TV shows to choose from, there’s always something great to watch on myTunes and if you watch on Orange TV 4K, you’ll be able to enjoy a tremendous selection of your favorite content in 4K HDR. So get ready to enjoy episodes of your favorite TV shows or hit movies you’ve been waiting to see — anytime, anywhere. Just tap to play, or even download if you’re going somewhere you won’t have Wi-Fi.
